definitions.definition: An ongoing winner in a game or contest.
definitions.example: The defending champion is expected to defeat his challenger.

definitions.definition: Someone who is chosen to represent a group of people in a contest.
definitions.example: Barcelona is eligible to play in FIFA Club World Cup as the champion of Europe.

definitions.definition: Someone who fights for a cause or status.
Someone who fights on another's behalf.
To promote, advocate, or act as a champion for (a cause, etc.).
Acting as a champion; that has defeated all one's competitors.
(predicative) Excellent; brilliant; superb; deserving of high praise.
